content: march 2024 - this pattern has been updated to add a v-neck option ready to be re-released as a cal from 29th march 2024 1 pattern section will be released from 29th march 2024 viewable on my website alongside a detailed video tutorial too the pattern features inset sleeves to prevent any excess material under the arms to ensure a comfy fit the cable stitch is featured throughout the pattern to keep this crochet cardigan lightweight but made with aran or worsted weight yarn will ensure that you ll be cosy whatever the weather there is 2 inches of positive ease written into the patterns so this means that you will be able to layer this with long sleeve tee-shirts and thinner sweaters for extra warmth in the colder weather too the pattern is suitable for intermediate crocheters and those beginners who are looking for a challenge there is a detailed tutorial to help you join the panels to construct your cardigan along with stitch tutorials for the stitches used in the pattern all my patterns are fully tested and editing for accuracy wherever possible video stitch tutorials are provided to help you complete your project if you do have any questions or need so support during your making simply drop me a message and i ll be able to help pattern details - uk terms & us terms - file type pdf - page size a4 210mm x 297mm - language english - download will include 2 x colour pdf 1 x uk terms 1 x us terms - skill level - advanced beginner/intermediate ***materials *** - aran/worsted - size 5 5mm crochet hook other materials needed - stitch markers x 6 optional - hook & eye closing sizing this cardigan is oversize with a positive ease of 2 inches if you d like a more roomy fit make one size up written in 9 sizes to fit bust xs - 28-30 inches s - 32-34 inches m - 36-38 inches l - 40-42 inches xl - 44-46 inches 2xl- 48-50 inches 3xl - 52-54 inches 4xl - 56-58 inches 5xl - 60-52 inches don t forget to follow and tag me on social media facebook www facebook com/cosyrosieuk instagram @cosyrosieuk www cosyrosieuk com ***important*** - i do not accept returns or refunds - please do not copy or claim as your own - you may sell physical product versions of these however please credit me as the designer - please do not sell the pdf - if you have any questions please contact me via the contact option on my page or pop me an email at fiona@cosyrosieuk co uk all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2021
